nodes.text: A B1 battle droid participated in the Battle of Dathomir around 21 BBY under command of Separatist Supreme Commander General Grievous.

During the battle, the droid was stationed inside the bridge of Grievous's C-9979 landing craft and informed him that former Dark Acolyte Asajj Ventress was leading the attack against the droid army along the eastern front. Grievous then ordered the droid to send in the Defoliator Deployment Tank to burn the Nightsisters to the ground.
The B1-Series battle droid, like every battle droid in The Clone Wars movie and The Clone Wars TV series, was voiced by Matthew Wood. His name was never given.
